mapper.insert: insert into star_nft_wallet_record(is_deleted, created_at, created_by, modified_at, modified_by, record_sn, from_uid, to_uid, ts_type, ts_money, pay_channel, remark, pay_status, pay_time, fetch_status, fetch_time, check_status, check_time) values (#{isDeleted}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{modifiedAt}, #{modifiedBy}, #{recordSn}, #{fromUid}, #{toUid}, #{tsType}, #{tsMoney}, #{payChannel}, #{remark}, #{payStatus}, #{payTime}, #{fetchStatus}, #{fetchTime}, #{checkStatus}, #{checkTime})
mapper.update:
update star_nft_wallet_record
id = #{id},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
created_at = #{createdAt},
created_by = #{createdBy},
modified_at = #{modifiedAt},
modified_by = #{modifiedBy},
record_sn = #{recordSn},
from_uid = #{fromUid},
to_uid = #{toUid},
ts_type = #{tsType},
ts_money = #{tsMoney},
pay_channel = #{payChannel},
remark = #{remark},
pay_status = #{payStatus},
pay_time = #{payTime},
fetch_status = #{fetchStatus},
fetch_time = #{fetchTime},
check_status = #{checkStatus},
check_time = #{checkTime},
where 1=1
AND id = #{id}
AND record_sn = #{recordSn}
;
mapper.insert:
insert into star_nft_wallet_record(id,is_deleted,created_at,created_by,modified_at,modified_by,record_sn,from_uid,to_uid,ts_type,ts_money,pay_channel,remark,pay_status,pay_time,fetch_status,fetch_time,check_status,check_time) values
(#{entity.id},#{entity.isDeleted},#{entity.createdAt},#{entity.createdBy},#{entity.modifiedAt},#{entity.modifiedBy},#{entity.recordSn},#{entity.fromUid},#{entity.toUid},#{entity.tsType},#{entity.tsMoney},#{entity.payChannel},#{entity.remark},#{entity.payStatus},#{entity.payTime},#{entity.fetchStatus},#{entity.fetchTime},#{entity.checkStatus},#{entity.checkTime})
on duplicate key update id=values(id), is_deleted=values(is_deleted), created_at=values(created_at), created_by=values(created_by), modified_at=values(modified_at), modified_by=values(modified_by), record_sn=values(record_sn), from_uid=values(from_uid), to_uid=values(to_uid), ts_type=values(ts_type), ts_money=values(ts_money), pay_channel=values(pay_channel), remark=values(remark), pay_status=values(pay_status), pay_time=values(pay_time), fetch_status=values(fetch_status), fetch_time=values(fetch_time), check_status=values(check_status), check_time=values(check_time)
